Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Ongoing gang-related extortion and violence in region
Crimes.Mitigating_Factors: State efforts to combat gang activity (implied by generalized risk assessment)
Crimes.Prior_Criminality: Pattern of gang criminality in Guatemala
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Generally credible but insufficient to prove personalized risk
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicants found credible but claims not legally sufficient
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Generalized risk to small business owners
Crimes.Targeted_Victimization: No unique targeting beyond group membership
Crimes.Targeted_Individual_Status: Member of economically active civilian group
Crimes.Geographic_Context: Urban areas in Guatemala with high gang presence
Crimes.Government_Body_Involved: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee protection claim involving failure to report extortion
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether risk from non-reporting is personalized or generalized
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Applicants did not provide evidence of state inability to protect
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim dismissed due to generalized risk and lack of state protection failure proof
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicants to demonstrate inadequate state protection
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Applicants' fear acknowledged but not legally determinative
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Personalized risk required under IRPA s. 97(1)(b)
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adequacy of reasoning in Board decision
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of gang violence after closing business and receiving threats
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Process found fair and compliant with natural justice
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Testimony of applicants, country condition reports
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Claim that state protection was inadequate
Crimes.Remedy_Sought: Certification for appeal and refugee status
Crimes.Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review under Federal Courts Act

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee protection based on extortion by gangs
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Pattern of systemic extortion in region
Crimes.Mitigating_Factors: Potential access to police protection (not proven ineffective)
Crimes.Prior_Criminality: History of gang-related extortion in area
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Sufficient to show extortion but not personalized risk
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Credible but not sufficient to meet legal threshold
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicants believed but risk deemed generalized
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Due to perceived wealth, not individual characteristics
